name: youtube-studio-comment-helper
description: Clean YouTube Studio Comment Helper - handle to display name replacement

scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run validate
scripts.release: npm run build && npx standard-version --skip.tag=true && npm run version:sync && git add manifest.json package.json CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'chore(release): sync manifest version' || echo 'No sync commit'
scripts.release:tag: npx standard-version && npm run version:sync && git add manifest.json package.json CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'chore(release): sync manifest version' || echo 'No sync commit'
